title: iPod Classic
overview: The iPod Classic provides massive storage capacity, a sleek design, and an intuitive interface for an unparalleled music and video experience.
details: Available in 80GB or 160GB storage options, capable of holding up to 40,000 songs or 200 hours of video.
Up to 40 hours of battery life for extended listening and viewing.
Cover Flow lets you browse music visually by flipping through album art.
Enhanced user interface for a better browsing and playback experience.
Durable and stylish anodized aluminum and polished stainless steel enclosure.

specifications.Battery Life: Up to 40 hours audio, up to 7 hours video
specifications.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, WAV, AIFF, Apple Lossless
